title: Simulating multiple variability in spatially resolved transcriptomics with scCube
details: J Qian, H Bao, X Shao, Y Fang, J Liao, Z Chen, C Li… - Nature Communications, 2024
abstract: A pressing challenge in spatially resolved transcriptomics (SRT) is to benchmark the computational methods. A widely-used approach involves utilizing simulated data. However, biases exist in terms of the currently available simulated SRT data, which …
